channel.title: Anduin on From Draenor With Love
channel.description: Recent content in Anduin on From Draenor With Love

item.title: iWrynny
item.description: Somewhere out there in Pandaria, there’s an armorsmith with one twisted sense of humor. Poor clueless little Anduin. Hands up if you saw him step onto that platform covered in Sha magic and walk right up to Garrosh, and thought to yourself “welp, I have a bad feeling about how this is going to turn out.” AND SURE ENOUGH. Should have listened to Dezco, kid. Even if he does wear babies as armor.

item.title: There Will Be Blood
item.description: From a recent Mists beta build: Glyph of Gushing Wound. WTF is it with WARRIOR glyphs in Mists? Cripes. Lighting themselves on fire, lightning strikes, flocks of crows, and now MORE BLOOD? Blizz is sure giving them some pretty fun cosmetic options! Also, these might seriously be my favorite type of strip. I don’t know if Vid was quite as big a fan of this particular one though. July 24
